Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-35195 affecting package python-requests for versions less than 2.31.0-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-35195 affecting package python-requests for versions less than 2.31.0-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package python-requests is earlier than 2.31.0-2, affected by CVE-2024-35195
